article_title: Crews investigate house fire in Springfield
article_text:
Multiple fire agencies responded to a house fire Sunday evening in Springfield.

Officials were called to a home on Sanders Lane around 6:30 p.m., where a home was engulfed in flames.

No one was inside the home when crews arrived, and there were no injuries. Fire officials say the house is a total loss.

At this time crews are still investigating what caused the fire.

We will bring you more information when it becomes available.

article_metadata.description: Fire crews continue to investigate what caused a house fire Sunday evening in Springfield.
